name: Tower Of London
description: The Tower of London, officially Her Majesty's Royal Palace and Fortress of the Tower of London, is a historic castle on the north bank of the River Thames in central London.
offers: buy 2 tickets to qualify for 50% off at qa_cinema *Tuesday's & Thursday's only*
contactDetails: address: St Katharine's & Wapping, London EC3N 4AB England

name: Slug & Lettuce
description: Our restaurant and bar concept is synonymous with great food and drink. Beautifully located on St Katharine Docks right by the waterside and to an impressive backdrop of the Tower of London, The Slug & Lettuce Tower Bridge is the exciting newest addition to The Slug & Lettuce family.
Offers: 1 free drink when you purchase 2 tickets at qa_cinema *Monday's & Wednesday's only*
contactDetails: address: Unit 1 Tower Bridge Tower Bridge Road St Katharine Docks, London SE1 2UP England

name: Strada Dockside
description: An Italian restaurant situated at St. Katharine Docks, overlooking the marina, and just a short walk from Tower Bridge and the Tower of London.
offers: 30% off qa_cinema tickets when you spend Â£35 or more at Strada *Friday only*
contactDetails: address: Unit 2 Tower Bridge Tower Bridge Road St Katharine Docks, London SE1 2UP England

name: Wilton's Music Hall
description: Wilton's is the world's oldest surviving Grand Music Hall. After years of dereliction it is now open as a full time theatre.
offers: Free popcorn and drink at qa_cinema when you purchase 2 tickets at Wilton's Music Hall *valid for one small popcorn & one small drink only*
contactDetails: address: Wilton's Music Hall, 1 Graces Alley, London, E1 8JB

name: Potters Fields Park
description: Potters Fields Park is a green space by the Thames next to Tower Bridge. An oasis of lawns and wildlife-friendly gardens, it's also available to hire.
offers: Hire this venue for 1 day and receive 2 free tickets for you and a friend valid at qa_cinema *tickets valid for Monday & Wednesday entry to a standard viewing only*
contactDetails: address: Wilton's Music Hall, 1 Graces Alley, London, E1 8JB
